name: jasmin-realtime
postCreateCommand: apk add --update git; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install -U autopep8; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade build; /usr/local/bin/python -m pip install --upgrade twine; echo "alias build='rm -rf dist/*; python3 -m build'; alias push='python3 -m twine upload -u __token__ -p \$PYPI_TOKEN dist/*'; export PYPI_TOKEN=pypi-AgEIcHlwaS5vcmcCJGYwMTdiYTBiLWYxYjktNGE2Ni05ZmZhLTIwNWRlNzJlYWEyNAACF1sxLFsiamFzbWluLXJlYWx0aW1lIl1dAAIsWzIsWyJkZmQ4NTY5YS1mMWQ3LTRiM2MtOTUyMy04NWFiY2U5ZjYwNGYiXV0AAAYgZ6l59N7qc-7XvmTNxT18CEJb4Q4gaB12CLUeCSRkbTk" > ~/.bashrc
